thread.title: Remy Ma Drops Nicki Minaj Diss Track ‘Shether’
thread.title_full: Remy Ma Drops Nicki Minaj Diss Track ‘Shether’

author: David Fischer
title: Remy Ma Drops Nicki Minaj Diss Track ‘Shether’
text:
In a response to Nicki Minaj’s recent song with Gucci Mane, “Make Love,” Remy Ma has now taken a big swing at her with the release of her diss track “Shether.” The almost 7 minute track, goes in hard and she is not holding back with lines such as “F–k Nicki Minaj.”
Remy Ma took a big swing at Nicki Minaj on Saturday (Feb. 24), dropping a scathing diss track in what appears to be in response to Minaj’s recent song with Gucci Mane, “Make Love.” The cover art further underlines that with Minaj’s pink-haired Barbie doll cut into bloody pieces. Listen to the track now here below.

“You stole that line about bitches being your sons/ How you take my ’09 jail tweet and run Talkin’ ‘bout bringing knives to a fight with guns/ When the only shot you ever took was in your buns.”
Nicki Minaj immediately reacted to the track on Instagram earlier today.
😘 she said *bey 🎀 
A post shared by Nicki Minaj (@nickiminaj) on Feb 25, 2017 at 10:58am PST 

🎀 
A post shared by Nicki Minaj (@nickiminaj) on Feb 24, 2017 at 4:55pm PST
